Plot: Denis revisits Africa, this time exploring a place rife with civil and racial conflict. A white French family outlawed in its home and attempting to save its coffee plantation connects with...
Title: White Material
Writer: Claire Denis (scenario), Marie N'Diaye (scenario), Lucie Borleteau (collaboration)
Actors: Isabelle Huppert, Christopher Lambert, Nicolas Duvauchelle, William Nadylam
